pullRequest.body:
Move the parts of `*.Pointwise.*` that depend on `MulAction` to `*.Action.Pointwise.*`

For the new copyright headers, see
* https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib3/pull/18674 for `Algebra.Group.Pointwise.Set.Finite`; `Algebra.Group.Action.Pointwise.Set.Finite`

---
